mapper.select: select c.userNo, g.goodsNo, g.goodsStock, g.goodsName, g.goodsCompany, g.goodsPrice, g.mainFname,g.shipPrice, c.cartCnt from goods g left join cart c on g.goodsNo=c.goodsNo where userNo=#{userNo} order by goodsNo
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartNo, userNo, goodsNo,cartCnt, cartDate) values(seq_cartNo.nextVal,#{userNo},#{goodsNo},#{cartCnt},sysDate)
mapper.delete: delete cart where userNo=#{userNo} and goodsNo=#{goodsNo}
delete from cart c where EXISTS(select 1 from goods g where g.goodsNo=c.goodsNo and c.userNo=#{userNo} and g.goodsStock=0)
mapper.update: update cart set cartCnt=#{cartCnt} where goodsNo=#{goodsNo} and userNo=#{userNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where userNo=#{userNo}
